name: antibot-taskforce
description:
York University

Datt4300 Game4 Group5

Instruction:

"antibot-taskforce " is the refining project of our last game-Back to Future.  It is a 3D modelling game with a 2D version made by Unity. Download the rar file and extract. Double click the exe file called antibot-taskforce inside the folder to play.

GamePlay:

Danger! Some evil robots from the Year 2050 are travelling through time to the Year 2000. They want to occupy the Earth in Year two thousand since humans don't have enough technology at that time. You are a time guardian soldier also from the Year 2050. Your mission is to destroy those evil robot travellers to save the world.

Defeat the enemies, avoid the traps, collect some special powers like double jump in the map and finally get to the destination! Enjoy the game!

Control:

Keyboard "a,d" to move

Keyboard "space" to jump 

left mouse button ---- shoot
